name: No Man's University
description:
No Man's University - a game about a students life and the hardships that a student needs to face during these years of torture:

  • Meeting quite unpleasant enemies
  • Buying drinks to help them fight
  • Raising up your stats, to combat stronger enemies.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement.
  • E - interactions.
  • C - player stats screen.
  • Combat UI is controlled either with keys or the mouse.
  • Interactive defense mechanic - press the key that pops up on your screen in time after starting your attack to reduce the incoming damage from the enemy by half!

After beating an enemy you'll gain experience and gold. Use experience points to level up your stats in the player stats screen in your living room. 100 exp = 1 point.

Later, you will encounter a shop where you can buy potions, which can be used to help you in combat.

Grind the enemies, buy all the potions, level up your stats to beat more stronger enemies.
